nodes.text: The Founder was a Valor-class cruiser in the Republic Navy under the service of the Supreme Chancellor. It served as the personal transport of the Supreme Chancellor and their entourage..

Built just after the Sacking of Coruscant the Founder was a modified version of a Valor-class cruiser. It was first seen in 3,641 BBY, and was equipped with the latest in secure communication technology, it also hada luxurious lounge and dining area and sleeping quarters for the Supreme Chancellor and their aides. The vessel included an area to conduct diplomatic discussions.
